show_name: The Everyday Tales of a Cat God (TV)
plot: Koyama Yuzu is running an antique shop. Mayu, a cat god (nekogami), is living off Yuzu and leads an idle life playing games. Lots of other gods visit Mayu and enjoy merrymaking.
opening_theme: "Kami-sama to Issho" (神サマといっしょ) by Haruka Tomatsu and Yui Horie
ending_theme: "Yaoyorozu Ondo" (やおよろず音頭) by Haruka Tomatsu and Yuuko Sanpei (ep 7)
